snippet: With Berlin Brandenburg Airport set to open, many air travelers say they will miss the convenience of Tegel, an airport designed in an era when vast shopping spaces were not paramount.
abstract: Berlin Journal; with Berlin Brandenburg Airport set to open, many air travelers say they will miss the convenience of Tegel, an airport designed for convenience so travelers could drive close to the gate; the new design gives priority to vast shopping spaces.
lead_paragraph: With Berlin Brandenburg Airport set to open, many air travelers say they will miss the convenience of Tegel, an airport designed in an era when vast shopping spaces were not paramount.

headline.seo: Berlin Is Getting a New Airport, but Many Prefer the Old
headline.main: In a New Age of Air Travel, Preferring the Old
headline.print_headline: In a New Age of Air Travel, Preferring the Old
